title: Error printed to dial each character of the IP address

labels.name: scope-logging
labels.description: Issue about logs: hygiene, format issues, improvements.

body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Expected behavior**

Dial the full IP
The full error below `Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 50.65.36.10:9000` shows the proper IP, is this a logger issue?
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed in 15 days if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
Closing issues for specific incidents on old versions of Lodestar, please re-open if it happens with latest stable
